name: Imperceptible
description:
Not everything is as it seems, some might say its imperceptible

Play as Sparrow and Winton, Winton who has the ability to FIND green platforms through his own eyes, but at the LOSS of seeing through mirrors, and Sparrow, who as the ability to see pink platforms through mirrors but at the LOSS of an abilty to see green platforms.

Controls:

WASD - Move

SHIFT - Run
SPACE - Jump

Q/Tab - Switch character

E/I/M - Draw view

Credits:

A game by Daniel Kierkegaard Andersen & Alex Schjermer Lauridsen

Thank you:
Alexander Hansen - A helping hand with music
Sebastian Lague - Helping with portals
Birkeman - being a great sport helping with shaders
Ashii - helping us out with houdini
